item.description: Hello, My name is Christina and I'm a junior in the School of Management at Boston University. I am working working with a group of students for a class to build a business plan around a new product idea. Our product is a user-friendly water meter that attaches easily to household sinks, and let's the user know in real time, how much water he/she consumed. Your input would be greatly appreciated. Snacks and refreshments will be provided! Thank you for your time!

group.name: H2O Boston: Water and Energy Technology Meetup

item.name: Boston University School of Management Focus Group on Water Conservation Product
